name: Another World Tower
description:
Dark flame, demons, monster, despair, and light. Light will clear all the evil that’s what all the people says. 50 years has passed since the last demon king killed by the holy saint but evil always appear wherever there is goodness. The son of the demon king appear and come to revenge his father.  Now it’s your turn to be the holy saint that kill the next demon king.

This is a story about an adventurer who wants to be strong in order to become a tower conqueror. tower Conqueror  is someone who managed to kill the boss tower or to conquer tower in its own way. Someone who managed to conquer tower will automatically get tremendous power and by that many people spend a lot of money and even life to conquer the tower. but not a few people also got a dead end, tragic end, and even sell his own kingdom just for the sake of being a tower conqueror. That's what they believe, but the fact is...

You will need RTP to run this game.

Download it here : http://cached-downloads.degica.com/degica-downloads/RPGVXAce_RTP.zip
